verses.verse: And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Ye mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> against you <S%H1889><s%>, Aha! and <S%H5769><s%>, The ancient high places <S%H1116><s%> are ours in possession <S%H4181><s%>;

therefore prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because <S%H8074><s%>, even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up <S%H7602><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>, that ye might be a possession <S%H4181><s%> unto the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and ye are taken up <S%H5927><s%> in the lips <S%H8193><s%> of talkers <S%H3956><s%>, and the evil report <S%H1681><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>;

therefore <S%H2022><s%>, ye mountains of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills <S%H1389><s%>, to the watercourses <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys <S%H1516><s%>, to the desolate <S%H8074><s%> wastes <S%H2723><s%> and to the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are forsaken <S%H5800><s%>, which are become a prey <S%H957><s%> and derision <S%H3933><s%> to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%>;

therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Surely in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> have I spoken <S%H1696><s%> against the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and against all Edom <S%H123><s%>, that have appointed <S%H5414><s%> my land <S%H776><s%> unto themselves for a possession <S%H4181><s%> with the joy <S%H8057><s%> of all their heart <S%H3824><s%>, with despite <S%H7589><s%> of soul <S%H3824><s%>, to cast it out <S%H4054><s%> for a prey <S%H957><s%>.

Therefore prophesy <S%H5012><s%> concerning the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills <S%H1389><s%>, to the watercourses <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys <S%H1516><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Behold <S%H1696><s%>, I have spoken in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in my wrath <S%H2534><s%>, because ye have borne <S%H5375><s%> the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>:

therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: I have <S%H5375><s%> sworn <S%H3027><s%>, saying <S%H1471><s%>, Surely the nations that are round about <S%H5439><s%> you <S%H5375><s%>, they shall bear their shame <S%H3639><s%>.

But ye <S%H2022><s%>, O mountains of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, ye shall shoot forth <S%H5414><s%> your branches <S%H6057><s%>, and yield <S%H5375><s%> your fruit <S%H6529><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>; for they are at hand <S%H7126><s%> to come <S%H935><s%>.
For <S%H6437><s%>, behold, I am for you, and I will turn unto you <S%H5647><s%>, and ye shall be tilled and sown <S%H2232><s%>;

and I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> men <S%H120><s%> upon you <S%H1004><s%>, all the house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even all of it <S%H5892><s%>; and the cities shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%>, and the waste <S%H2723><s%> places shall be builded <S%H1129><s%>;

and I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> upon you man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>; and they shall increase <S%H7235><s%> and be fruitful <S%H6509><s%>; and I will cause you to be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> after your former estate <S%H6927><s%>, and will do better <S%H2895><s%> unto you than at your beginnings <S%H7221><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Yea <S%H120><s%>, I will cause men to walk <S%H3212><s%> upon you <S%H5971><s%>, even my people Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> thee <S%H5159><s%>, and thou shalt be their inheritance, and thou shalt no more <S%H3254><s%> henceforth bereave them of children <S%H7921><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because they say <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H398><s%>, Thou land art a devourer of men <S%H120><s%>, and hast been a bereaver <S%H7921><s%> of thy nation <S%H1471><s%>;
therefore thou shalt devour <S%H398><s%> men <S%H120><s%> no more <S%H7921><s%>, neither bereave thy nation <S%H1471><s%> any more <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>;

neither will I let thee hear <S%H8085><s%> any more the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, neither shalt thou bear <S%H5375><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> any more <S%H1471><s%>, neither shalt thou cause thy nation to stumble <S%H3782><s%> any more <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, when the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their own land <S%H127><s%>, they defiled <S%H2930><s%> it by their way <S%H1870><s%> and by their doings <S%H5949><s%>: their way <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me was as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of a woman in her impurity <S%H5079><s%>.

Wherefore I poured <S%H8210><s%> out my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon them for the blood <S%H1818><s%> which they had poured <S%H8210><s%> out upon the land <S%H776><s%>, and because they had defiled <S%H2930><s%> it with their idols <S%H1544><s%>;

and I scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and they were dispersed <S%H2219><s%> through the countries <S%H776><s%>: according to their way <S%H1870><s%> and according to their doings <S%H5949><s%> I judged them <S%H8199><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> unto the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whither they went <S%H935><s%>, they profaned <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>; in that men said <S%H559><s%> of them <S%H5971><s%>, These are the people of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and are gone forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his land <S%H776><s%>.

But I had regard <S%H2550><s%> for my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whither they went <S%H935><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: I do <S%H6213><s%> not this for your sake <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, but for my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whither ye went <S%H935><s%>.

And I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> my great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which hath been profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, which ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them <S%H1471><s%>; and the nations shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

For I will take <S%H3947><s%> you from among <S%H4480><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of all the countries <S%H776><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> you into your own land <S%H127><s%>.

And I will sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> upon you <S%H2891><s%>, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness <S%H2932><s%>, and from all your idols <S%H1544><s%>, will I cleanse you <S%H2891><s%>.

A new <S%H2319><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> also will I give <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H2319><s%>, and a new spirit <S%H7307><s%> will I put <S%H5414><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H5493><s%>; and I will take away the stony <S%H68><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> out of your flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

And I will put <S%H5414><s%> my Spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, and cause you to walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and do them <S%H6213><s%>.
And ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%>; and ye shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be your God <S%H430><s%>.

And I will save <S%H3467><s%> you from all your uncleannesses <S%H2932><s%>: and I will call <S%H7121><s%> for the grain <S%H1715><s%>, and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> it <S%H5414><s%>, and lay no famine upon you <S%H7458><s%>.

And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and the increase <S%H8570><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, that ye may receive <S%H3947><s%> no more the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

Then shall ye remember <S%H2142><s%> your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, and your doings <S%H4611><s%> that were not good <S%H2896><s%>; and ye shall loathe <S%H6962><s%> yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and for your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

Not for your sake do <S%H6213><s%> I this <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, be it known <S%H3045><s%> unto you <S%H954><s%>: be ashamed and confounded <S%H3637><s%> for your ways <S%H1870><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I cleanse <S%H2891><s%> you from all your iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, I will cause the cities <S%H5892><s%> to be inhabited <S%H3427><s%>, and the waste <S%H2723><s%> places shall be builded <S%H1129><s%>.
And the land <S%H776><s%> that was desolate <S%H8074><s%> shall be tilled <S%H5647><s%>, whereas it was a desolation <S%H8077><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all that passed by <S%H5674><s%>.

And they shall say <S%H559><s%>, This <S%H1977><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that was desolate <S%H8074><s%> is become like the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>; and the waste <S%H2720><s%> and desolate <S%H8074><s%> and ruined <S%H2040><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are fortified <S%H1219><s%> and inhabited <S%H3427><s%>.

Then the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are left <S%H7604><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have builded <S%H1129><s%> the ruined <S%H2040><s%> places <S%H5193><s%>, and planted that which was desolate <S%H8074><s%>: I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, and I will do it.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: For this <S%H1875><s%>, moreover, will I be inquired of by the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> it for them <S%H7235><s%>: I will increase them with men <S%H120><s%> like a flock <S%H6629><s%>.

As the flock <S%H6629><s%> for sacrifice <S%H6944><s%>, as the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in her appointed feasts <S%H4150><s%>, so shall the waste <S%H2720><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> be filled <S%H4392><s%> with flocks <S%H6629><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
